heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of snow or rain showers in the valleys; another trace to an inch of snow, mainly over high terrain, with some freezing drizzle also possible there. Valley highs in the low to mid 30s north, and mid to upper 30s in the south. Winds variable to northwest at around 5 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of snow showers or patchy freezing drizzle north and in the southern Greens, mainly before midnight. Lows in the mid to upper 20s, some lower 20s northeast. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Thursday
text: Decreasing clouds. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40, with some lower 30s northeast, and some lower 40s far south. West to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.
